titleStmt.title: The life and death of David. A sermon preached at the funeralls of that worthy member of the Honourable House of Commons, William Strode Esquire, in the Abbey Church in Westminster, Septemb. 22⁰. 1645. / By Gaspar Hickes, a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, Gaspar, 1605-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Miller for Christopher Meredith at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
